com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core

Interface IMleObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MleActor, MleSet

    public interface IMleObject
    This interface is used to define functionality that is shared across Magic Lantern Runtime classes.

    The IMleObject interface specifies a common way of setting and retrieving properties.

    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPropertyChangeListener(java.lang.String name, IMlePropChangeListener listener)
      Adds a IMlePropChangeListener for a specific property.
      java.lang.Object getProperty(java.lang.String name)
      Get the value of the property with the specified name.

      Report a bound property change.
      void removePropertyChangeListener(java.lang.String name, IMlePropChangeListener listener)
      Removes a IMlePropChangeListener for a specific property.
      void setProperty(java.lang.String name, IMleProp property)
      Set the value of the property with the specified name.

      Set the value of the property with the specified name.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        java.lang.Object getProperty(java.lang.String name)
                      throws MleRuntimeException
        Get the value of the property with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property as a String.
        Returns:
        The property value is returned as an Object.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified property can not be retrieved.

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(java.lang.String name,
                 IMleProp property)
          throws MleRuntimeException
        Set the value of the property with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property as a String.
        property - The property to set.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified property can not be set.

      • setPropertyArray

        void setPropertyArray(java.lang.String name,
                      int length,
                      int nElements,
                      java.io.ByteArrayInputStream value)
               throws MleRuntimeException
        Set the value of the property with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property as a String.
        length - The length of each property, in bytes.
        nElements - The number of elements in the array, each of size length.
        value - The value of the property to set.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified property can not be set.

      • notifyPropertyChange

        void notifyPropertyChange(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.Object oldProperty,
                          java.lang.Object newProperty)
                   throws MleRuntimeException
        Report a bound property change. If oldValue and newValue are not equal and the MlePropChangeEvent listener list isn't empty, then fire a MlePropChangeEvent event to each listener.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property that was changed.
        oldProperty - The old value of the property (as an Object).
        newProperty - The new value of the property (as an Object).
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if registered property listeners can not be notified.

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        void addPropertyChangeListener(java.lang.String name,
                               IMlePropChangeListener listener)
                        throws MleRuntimeException
        Adds a IMlePropChangeListener for a specific property. The listener will be invoked only when a call on notifyPropertyChange names that specific property. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property to listen on.
        listener - The IMlePropChangeListener to be added.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the property listener can not be added. It is also thrown if the name argument is null.

      • removePropertyChangeListener

        void removePropertyChangeListener(java.lang.String name,
                                  IMlePropChangeListener listener)
                           throws MleRuntimeException
        Removes a IMlePropChangeListener for a specific property. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property that was listened on.
        listener - The IMlePropChangeListener to be removed.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the property listener can not be removed. It is also thrown if the name argument is null.
